content: Hello there. I trying to figure out how to use tactics in lean. Im using the lean4 metaprogramming book Im trying to figure out how to use elab with tactics. Can someone please show me an example of using a tactic in an elab. Make sure you share it with the lean web version
louq has marked this topic as resolved.

elab "reverse_goals" : tactic => do
let goals ← Lean.Elab.Tactic.getGoals
Lean.Elab.Tactic.evalTactic (← (tactic|try simp; rfl)) Lean.Elab.Tactic.evalTactic (← (tactic|try rfl))
